articles.author: Ben Kaye
articles.title: Chevy Chase Told Jason Reitman “You Should Be Embarrassed” About Saturday Night Movie
articles.description: In a perfectly Chevy Chase response, the comedian told Saturday Night director/writer Jason Reitman "you should be embarrassed" over the movie.
articles.content: If there are two things to know about Chevy Chase, it’s that he’s one of Saturday Night Live’s biggest, funniest stars ever — and he’s kind of a dick. That’s preciously how he’s depicted in filmmaker… [+2348 chars]
